channel.title: Outofboundsexcpetion : 17
channel.description:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:369) at server.world.ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:33) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:59) Could not find the main class: server.Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
I tried looking around item.cfg but i didnt find the error i searched 17 but i saw no errors in the code.

item.title: Outofboundsexcpetion : 17
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Epicmaul, post:1, topic:399551”]Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError
Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17
at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:369)
at server.world.ItemHandler.(ItemHandler.java:33)
at server.Server.(Server.java:59)
Could not find the main class: server.Server. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

I tried looking around item.cfg but i didnt find the error i searched 17 but i saw no errors in the code.[/quote]

That’s because it isn’t “17”.

Basically the error is that you added a space, when you should have added a tab to your items.cfg

Read full topic
